text: "Good Luck, Babe!" is a song written and recorded by American singer- songwriter Chappell Roan. It was released April 5, 2024. Roan wrote the song with Justin Tranter and its producer, Dan Nigro. It reached number one in Ireland and the top ten in various countries, including the US, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. The song speaks of a woman denying her romantic feelings for another woman. == Charts == === Weekly charts === Weekly chart performance for "Good Luck, Babe!"
